snippet.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All Star Battle - PS3 - First Trailer - Part 1, 2 & 3
snippet.description:
Enter the incredible universe of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure!

This gameplay trailer presents various battle scenes taken from the 1st, 2nd and 3rd chapter of the story.
Many other characters will join the fight with their other-world companions!

Chapter 1: Phantom Blood
JONATHAN JOESTAR & WILL ANTHONIO ZEPPELI

Chapter 2: Battle Tendency
JOSEPH JOESTAR, CAESAR ZEPPELLI, WAMUU, ESIDISI & KARS

Chapter 3: Stardust Crusaders
DIO BRANDO, KUJO JOTARO, MUHAMMAD AVDOL & JOSEPH JOESTAR with their respective "STANDS" THE WORLD, STAR PLATINUM, MAGICIAN'S RED & HERMIT PURPLE

The story isn't stopping here; stay tuned for more details over the next few weeks!

Developed by CyberConnect 2, JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All Star Battle is coming out in spring 2014 on Playstation 3.

Like us on Facebook! http://www.facebook.com/namcobandaigames.europe
Talk about this game, share tips & win goodies at http://www.namcobandaigames.eu/community
